title: Drawing, "Design for a Cocktail Shaker", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: In black ink at center right: 74.
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: SHAKER; in graphite:2/; in pen and black ink: DIAMETRE 10 cms/HAUTEUR 20 cms; at lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/6.41.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Cylindrical body drawn in plan and elevation. The curved surfaces of lid, shoulder and foot with reeded decoration. Top of the lid with a scalloped-edged plate. Rectangular spout attached to the left side of the body. Underdrawing in graphite of cocktail shaker in golden section.
This Cocktail Shaker is later version of #8536 Shaker, Moderne, uni couvercle filete avec grille interieur, (which carries fabrication date of 29.9.31, which is shaker with rounded and grooved cover, rather than flat scalloped cover).
Cocktail shaker illustrated in Rene, Herbst, Jean Puiforcat Orfevre Sculpteur, Paris: Flammarion, 1951, u.p.
